trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_SEQ_00<tab>Tsuzura watches intently as her companion polishes a shell.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TODO_00<tab>Search for Tsuzura's sister.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TODO_01<tab>Obtain the cotton kerchiefs.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the cotton kerchiefs to Tsuzura's sister.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Tsuzura.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_000<tab>You must be terribly bored if you have nothing better to do than stand there and watch us. How about I give you some work?
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_001<tab>My sister left to clean the cotton kerchiefs we use to polish our shells but she is slow to return.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_002<tab>Might you go and check the shores around the eastern cove to make sure nothing has happened to her?
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_003<tab>My sister went to wash our cotton kerchiefs but she does not return. Please check the area around the eastern cove to make sure no ill has befallen her.

TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Madam)) ((Sir)) /var>, please. I do not mean to be rude, but I have not the time to entertain anyone right now. The kerchiefs I was sent to wash were swept away by a strong gust of wind, and I must retrieve them before they are lost forever!

TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_011<tab>Tsuzura sent you to look for me? <sigh> My sister has always been impatient. I must hurry. I do not want to be scolded again. Please, might you assist me in my search?
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_012<tab>I will inspect the deep seas, so can you scour the coast? Let us meet back here once we are finished.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_020<tab>How did your search go?

TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_021<tab>One... Two... Three... That should be everything! Thank the kami! Thank <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>! Your keen eyes have spared my ears another long-winded lecture.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_022<tab>I always come here to launder our kerchiefs because they become much softer when they are dried under the sun.

TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_LITTLESISTER02691_000_023<tab>Unfortunately, they have gotten damp, so I will have to hang them out again. If you are returning to Tamamizu, please tell my sister I will be just a bit longer.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_030<tab>My sister lost the kerchiefs <var 1A 02 /var>again<var 1A 01 /var>? <sigh> Thank you for helping her gather them.

TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_031<tab>Ah, you are staring again. You want to know whose shell we are polishing, I take it? This one once belonged to a venerated ancestor of ours, who was reckoned a sage among our people.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_032<tab>Upon his death, his soul took up residence in his shell. We hang it on the gate to our village that he might continue to keep us safe.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_033<tab>After watching over Tamamizu for a few centuries, his soul will eventually depart from this place, and he will be reborn as a kami.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_034<tab>To thank him for his years of dedicated service, we regularly take down and polish his shell.
TEXT_STMBDZ219_02691_TUDURA_000_035<tab>For your help, we will ask that he also protect you. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>!
